PARTIES & EVENTS
CONTACT
Parties & Events
Hosting Unforgettable Events and Parties
Are you planning a special event, birthday party, or corporate event? Let Casa España Tapas y Vinos help make your celebration one to remember! Our experienced event team will work with you to customize every aspect of your event – from the menu to the entertainment.
In addition to our delicious, authentic Spanish cuisine and extensive selection of wines, we offer live music, private dining spaces, and an inviting atmosphere that will make your event unforgettable. Contact us today to start planning and make your next celebration a memorable one!
CONTACT US
The Perfect Venue for Any Occasion
Looking for the perfect venue for your next event or special occasion? Look no further than Casa España Tapas y Vinos! From intimate gatherings to large events, we offer a warm and inviting atmosphere that will make your guests feel right at home.
Our authentic Spanish cuisine and extensive selection of wines will delight your taste buds, while our experienced event team will ensure that every detail is taken care of. Host your wedding reception, birthday party, corporate event, or any other special occasion with us and experience the best of Spanish hospitality. Contact us today to start planning your event!
CONTACT US

Contact Us
Are you looking to indulge in some authentic Spanish cuisine at Casa España Tapas y Vinos? Or perhaps you have a special event coming up and are in search of the perfect venue? Whatever your needs may be, we are here to help!
If you are interested in booking Casa España Tapas y Vinos as the venue for your next event, whether it be a corporate function, birthday party or social events, we can help with that too! Contact us today to discuss your event needs and start planning a memorable experience at our restaurant.
